title: Carollzinha
author: Carollzinha
created_time: December 08, 2023, 03:28:10 AMLast edit: February 21, 2024, 03:03:15 PM by Carollzinha
content: Stake.com  Signature CampaignABOUT STAKEProviding a safe and secure betting experience since 2017, Stake.com is a worldwide leader in crypto gambling platforms for Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies. Enjoy a fun and easy way to use cryptos or FIAT to gamble on casino games & sports online! Stake offers over 3,000 casino games as well as 18 original games which have a house edge as low as 0.57%. Whether betting on casino games like Blackjack, Roulette, Game Shows or placing wagers on live sports, Stake is an easy choice with its vibrant community, live chat and ongoing promotions to provide an unbeatable gambling experience.RULES♦️ Must wear our signature, avatar & personal text♦️ Must make at least 25 quality posts per week♦️ At least 10 posts per week must be in Gambling and/or Gambling Discussion♦️ If the minimum posts requirements are not fulfilled the payrates will be half♦️ If you do not usually post at Gambling & Gambling Discussion sections please do not apply for this campaign♦️ Posts must be constructive and on topic♦️ 150 characters minimum. No links & overusing punctuation will count♦️ If you receive negative trust while enrolled we reserve the right to check & kick you out from the campaign with no pay♦️ Posts in Local Boards, Signature Campaigns, Bounty Threads, Games & Rounds, Off topic, Lending, Auctions, Beginners and Help & Archival will not count♦️ Posts at any section where signatures are disabled will not count for obvious reasons♦️ Every member of this campaign must be in our Telegram group for payment infos & news♦️ After your acceptance in this campaign please send a direct message on Telegram to @OgamiBR♦️ No application out of this topic will be accepted. Bitcointalk PMs & Telegram messages before your acceptance will be ignored.♦️ This campaign is in a trial period and therefore lasts until March/April♦️ If you are Hero or Legendary, you may want to check our Main Campaign Thread but if you are a Well Known Community Member, Donator, DT or belong to the Community Staff you can always drop me a private message to check the availability of a custom deal.PAYMENT INFORMATION♦️ Payments are sent in Bitcoin, every Tuesday, directly to users Stake’s account♦️ The payment is a fix $1.50 per post & limited to 25 posts/week♦️ The conversion from USD to BTC will be made at the time the payments list is sent out (normally from 2 to 3am GMT)♦️ If the minimum posts requirements were not reached, the payrate will be cut by half.A week runs from Tuesday 00h to Monday 11:59:59pm GMT. Posts after that will count for the next week.The post counts system is a basic last week final post count - the current post counting at your profile at 00:00 Tuesday (GMT) so post at self moderated sections at your own risk. (Note: in case of a massive posts deletion your last highest post count will stay as final post count until you can get it back to positive)HOW TO APPLYCode:Bitcointalk Username:Profile Link:Post
